"You do not want to f*** with me" - A former chief execu in a consultancy marketing firm has threatened to publicly divulge the names, addresses and bank details of customers of "the largest mobile phone company" [in Ireland] unless paid €135,000 by [Tuesday], the High Court was told [Monday].
